column4: hello, I am installing Breezy from cd onto a big hard disk (160 Gig).  I want to have a FAT partition with which to share files between linux and Windows where I plan to store my music movies and photos.  The partitioning tool that comes with the installer is confusing, and it has already skipped the set up partition step and is copying files.  I am afraid to bother it now, but I have heard about resizing partitions and adding more.  How can I
